summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1806, for the improvement of Smith Street, in the City of Seattle, from Fourth Avenue North to the eastern end of said Smith Street, by grading and curbing the same and constructing concrete sidewalks thereon, under Ordinance No. 18736, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
